name: City Sniper Strike 3D
description: Let play the biggest and unique City Sniper Strike 3D addictive games. In this  Shooting competition you are equipping with the latest new sniper shooting rifles aiming at the enemies on the city. Use your Helicaptor to take control of top buildings and aim the terrorist and destroy them.Strike Survive soldier has responsibilities to save the people life and war with enemies. Destroy enemy camps and terrorist; Completely enemy killing and shooting based for fans of hot shooting with stylized graphics and realistic thrilling environments. Sniper Combat is here for your great enjoyment time with Lots of astounding and action levels. You can also feel the real amazing weapon shooting effective sound on this combat army  mission simulated.Play as the best well-trained commando strike of special war weapons.You will have to navigate secret sniper missions to eliminate terrorists. Competes with other battle humans, on the modern frontier warfare. This is strategy world warfare to stop the universe of injustice.
